Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2013 12:47PM Pharmbecca5 wrote: Candy, I'm in the waiting game with you. I had my biopsy done yesterday. I'm 32 and we are also planning to start a family soon. I will pray for us both in the days coming forth because this waiting is so horrible! I am trying to think on the positive side and think of the statistics. Try to get rest as much as u can and hopefully this time will pass quickly for both of us!
Posts.Title: 35 & in panic Candy125 Candy125

Posts.Content: Pharmbecca5 wrote: Hi, I posted earlier about having a biopsy done earlier today. I've noticed in several posts that people have been given a BiRads status. I looked up what it means and understand the numbers but my doc never told me what number I am. I even called the nurse and had her read the report. Should I be worried she didn't give me more info? At this point I'm pretty much driving myself crazy. Hoping for news by Friday! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: BiRad? Pharmbecca5 besa

Posts.Content: Pharmbecca5 wrote: Hello everyone I'm still on here. It seems to be the only place where I get any peace of mind. The nurse called to check on me and said the labs haven't come back yet so I have another night to get thru. I've changed my mind so many times in the last few days over whether it will come back benign or not. I wish I could just give this one over to God but I'm really struggling. Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: Biopsy Tomorrow and I'm scared notready4this32 Sallyann

Posts.Content: Pharmbecca5 wrote: Hi! I've posted on here twice today because I don't know where else to go. I had my biopsy today and I am now enduring a sleepless night. I'm trying to not think negatively but that's all I seem to be capable of right now. I'm getting married this year and I've been so happy for the last couple of years with the love of my life that all I can think is maybe I was just too happy. I'm only 32 and I think about the babies we want to have and how this changes everything. I remember the night my mom got diagnosed like yesterday. I was 17 and I stayed up with her all night. I have never seen my mother like that before or since. Is it so wrong to not want to endure that too? Anyway I'm incredibly tired so nothing makes sense right now... Thanks for listening Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Sleepless Pharmbecca5 Pharmbecca5

Posts.Content: Feb 6, 2013 08:27AM Pharmbecca5 wrote: I should get the results by Friday. They said at most a week but to call on Friday if I haven't heard anything. Feeling better after a little sleep. Thanks everyone!
